name: @formatjs/intl-listformat
description: Formats JS list in a i18n-safe way
author: Long Ho <holevietlong@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn run cldr && yarn run compile
scripts.cldr: ts-node scripts/cldr --outDir locale-data --polyfillLocalesOutFile polyfill-locales.js --testDataDir tests/locale-data --test262MainFile tests/test262-main.js
scripts.compile: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && tsc -p tsconfig.es6.json && api-extractor run --local && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.test: yarn run jest && cross-env ts-node tests/runner
